properties.title: Amphitheater at Dura Europos
properties.comment: Capacity and date drawn from N. Pollard's "Soldiers, Cities, and Civilians in Roman Syria", p. 52
The capacity refers to number of seats after the early 2nd AD century expansion. In AD 19 the capacity was under 2000.
